name: sorsemovement
description:
Combines movement mechanics from all of the greatest source engine games: half life, cs:go, team fortress 2, titanfall1/2, apex legends
supported movement mechanics: walking, crouching, sliding, wallrunning, wallkicking, walljumping, lurching (also lurchless movement), tap strafing, momentum shifts, surfing, trimping, rocket jumping, grappling

[controller unsupported]

Alpha 0.02 version provides you with 2 maps, gauntlet + tutorial, and sandbox map.

sorsemovement is only a codename and will be replaced in the future.

Special thanks to pimpek32 for help with unity engine, and creating explosion VFX, Mach for providing info about source engine movement mechanics, and Ezioleq for testing.
